data.text: @Piper_Pike Hi Piyush, kindly cancel the booking through the manage booking option on our website with applicable charges. Once the cancellation is processed, please let us know, we shall process the applicable refund.
@HiRam30635505 Please contact Travel Boutique Online for refund claims.

#WeatherUpdate: Due to bad weather (heavy rain) in Kolkata (CCU), all departures/arrivals and their consequential flights may get affected. Passengers are requested to keep a check on their flight status via https://t.co/VkU7yLB2ny.

data.text:
@JasonBorne03493 Satish, kindly elaborate your concern via DM so we may check the details.

https://t.co/Qi2laHz2Nw

@HiRam30635505 Hi Ram, as checked, a full refund has been processed to the agency ID dated 20th Aug and 01st Sep'22. Please contact the agency for claims. You may write at custrelations@spicejet.com for an email confirmation.
@salvarai2 Hi Salva, we have received your DM, shall follow up there.
@Vedprabharuchir Hi Ruchira, you may carry the same in check-in luggage.

@Janavaj Hey! Kindly note that SpiceJet follows a dynamic pricing structure whereby the fares vary as per the seat availability per flight. We only have a certain number of seats available for a specific price, and once those are purchased, the next available fare is released.

@preeti_s7 Hi Preeti, please note, PNR J9D736 is incorrect. Kindly DM us the correct PNR so we may check and assist you.

https://t.co/UMdB9m2v7X

It's that time of the year when the land shimmers a little more than the sky. Our stars adding a little more love, laughter and joy to the festivities. A very Happy Diwali from our family to yours. ✨

#FlySpiceJet #SpiceJet #Festivities #Happiness #Love #DiwaliCelebration https://t.co/d5LWLCVPY6

data.text: @akraj59 Anil, we have processed refund towards the same account from which the booking was done. The amount shall reflect in your account within 7-10 working days. Your patience shall be appreciated.

data.text: @lakhani_muzamil Hi Muzamil, kindly note that SpiceJet follows a dynamic pricing structure whereby the fares vary as per the seat availability per flight. Hence, we'd not be in a position to consider your request in this regard.

@anilp0303 Hi Anil, this is a group booking and the names are yet to be updated in the booking. Please connect with the source of your booking for any assistance.

@sachauha Hi Bharat, kindly note, we always try our best to maintain the departures as per the schedule. However, at times, due to unavoidable reasons, we face delays. Please DM your PNR so we may look into it.
